author: 80raghavendra
content:
Are Merkle proofs used anywhere apart from light clients? 

I was under the impression that dapps will require Merkle proofs to trust the data provided from JSON_RPC queries. Am I right? How do all dapps currently work?

author: killari.
content: they are used in various places in dapps (airdrops, whitelists, zk proofs...), but not sure if you think that as part of "anywhere". Dapps are generally blindly trusting the JSON_RPC queries and they don't validate the results

content: Can you expand how Merkle proofs are used in Airdrops, Whitelists, Zk proofs?
